material: solid cast iron with half neoprene coating
usage: Strength training, body toning, and general workout exercises in gyms or home workout spaces.
key_features: Material: Cast iron half neoprene coated
Gives your body a total toning and strengthening workout
Ideal for gym and workout use
ai_description: A solid cast iron kettlebell with a textured black bell and a smooth dark grey handle. The lower body is half coated in matte neoprene, while the brand name “KAKSS” appears in white on the front. Its compact, rounded shape and sturdy handle are designed for controlled lifting.
target_audience: Fitness enthusiasts, gym-goers, and individuals looking to perform strength and conditioning workouts with kettlebells.
